newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico livestock report, feeder export price - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Mexico livestock report, feeder export price - USDA.

text.p: USDA reported Wednesday that around 1,600 head were exported into the United States at two crossing points Tuesday.
Through Santa Teresa, N.M., around 800 head were sold at steady prices compared to last week. Bulk of supply consisted of steers weighing 300-500 lb.
Prices for head weighing 300-400 lb were 88-98 cents/lb and for 400-500 lb head at 78-88 cents/lb.
Through Nogales, Ariz., around 800 head were sold at steady prices for steer calves. "Bulk of supply consisted of steers weighing 300-400 lb. Prices were 86-96 cents/lb for head weighing 300-400 lb.
((--Chris Aspin, Mexico City newsroom (525) 7289530. E-mail at chris.aspin@reuters.com))
